short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays important Trust information for your Salesforce instance.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shows trust information for the current instance right in your extension!

Active only on Salesforce.com pages. Works both in Classic and Lightning.

Doesn't require your credentials. Only your salesforce url is used to gather the trust information for your instance.
Doesn't read any of your data or transmit it anywhere.
